name: Tank - Tower Offender
description:
Work still in progress, therefore bugs are very likely to occur. 

Also there is no goal for the player currently, just a simple concept of a reverse Tower Defender, where the Player is the Tank, and the AI are the Towers.

A Top-Down 2D Tank Game where the player can switch through 4 weapons ranging from:

  • Simple shell - the old average joe shell
  • EMP shell - cuts electricity to towers in the area of effect
  • Sniper shell - can hit multiple targets along a straight line 
  • Nuke Shell - destroy all towers in a specific area of effect
